```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
data <- read.csv(file="/home/richard/owncloud/BINF/AlgoUE2019/A1/time_output.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")
plot(data$iteration, data$time_.s., ylab="time (s)", xlab = "Iteration")
points(data$iteration[data$algorithm == "efficient"],
       data$time_.s.[data$algorithm == "efficient"], col =
         "black", pch = 19)
points(data$iteration[data$algorithm == "inefficient"],
       data$time_.s.[data$algorithm == "inefficient"], col =
         "red", pch = 19)
legend("topleft", pch = 19, col = c("black", "red"), c("efficient", "inefficient"))
```
